title: LCAC Benchmark Metrics Schema
description: Schema for LCAC reasoning integrity, drift resistance, and cognitive trust benchmark outputs.

timestamp.description: UTC ISO-8601 timestamp of benchmark completion.

model.description: Name or identifier of the model, engine, or reasoning system tested.

benchmark_version.description: Version of the LCAC benchmark or Git commit hash.

metrics.description: Benchmark metrics collected from reasoning evaluation cycles.

drift_mean.description: Average drift magnitude across test intervals.

drift_std.description: Standard deviation of drift across evaluations.

stability_mean.description: Mean stability score of reasoning output consistency.

stability_std.description: Standard deviation of stability across tests.

trust_index.description: Composite trust index combining drift and stability (0â€“1).

verdict.description: Final qualitative assessment of model reasoning integrity.

notes.description: Optional metadata or annotations about runtime or context.
